price: (6) He causes the night to enter the day and causes the day to enter the night, and He is Knowing of that within the breasts.
arabic: يُولِجُ ٱلَّيۡلَ فِي ٱلنَّهَارِ وَيُولِجُ ٱلنَّهَارَ فِي ٱلَّيۡلِۚ وَهُوَ عَلِيمُۢ بِذَاتِ ٱلصُّدُورِ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: yūliju al-layla fī al-nahāri wayūliju al-nahāra fī al-layli wahuwa ʿalīmun bidhāti al-ṣudūri
translations: of what is in the breasts
of what is in the breasts
